column1: You have been selected as a {PositionDescription}
for {ClientName}. We’re delighted to extend this offer to you!
This letter contains terms and conditions of your potential employment.
New job, new adventure - here is the fun stuff!
Expected Date of Joining : {Expected Date} The actual joining date will be dependent on receipt of your work permit / Visa after which your joining date will be confirmed to you.
Please Note : You will be outsourced to work for AIQU’s client under the client Supervision.
Salary is calculated based on client approved timesheets.
Dedicated E-Care (Employee Care) team for HR related assistance.
AIDA, WhatsApp AI assistant, for prompt support on queries around payslip, leave balance and letter requests - +914466534488

column1: Sick leaves as per UAE Labour Law, subject to medical certificate issued by an authorized source as per the guidelines of the concerned health authority
Other leaves as per UAE labour law subject to provision of supporting documents. For instance- bereavement leave, parental leave etc.
End of service gratuity as per UAE Labour Law .
Incentives and bonuses as per client’s discretion.

Medical Insurance for {medical_category} under TASC’s Group Insurance Policy, upon completion of medical test. If you are on labour card, then medical insurance will be applicable after receiving your work permit.
Air ticket (Economy Class) to home country once every {AirTicketYears} limited to a maximum amount of AED {AirTicketAmount}
Little bit of paperwork, lots of trust - here is what we require!
This Offer Letter is subject to receipt of various documents and clearances, as listed below:
Police clearance certificate issued from the UAE, if required
Attested educational certificate and credentials, if required
Medical fitness certificate from a government authority.
Visa and legal entry permit by the UAE Ministry of Labour and immigration authorities.
Offer of services from the client. If the client’s offer is withdrawn prior to issuing your visa then AIQU can withdraw the offer without any financial compensation
Any individual overstays fine / Penalties imposed by UAE MOHRE, Immigration, should be cleared prior to visa process
Any personal information provided to AIQU will be stored on a cloud-based business application and will be used solely for securing your employment

Your personal information is safeguarded and protected, however, since no data transmission over internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure, AIQU will not be liable for any exposure of information from security risks such as viruses and unauthorized use
Your personal data is shared with the client and you consent to such disclosure and sharing

You can request TASC to erase your personal data. However, TASC reserves the right to save a copy of your personal data for legal purposes or archival purposes. If you request TASC to erase your personal data, this may affect your employment with TASC and TASC reserves the right to terminate your employment

TASC reserves the right to disclose and share your personal data with any statutory authorities or with a court pursuant to a legal process initiated against you or against TASC with respect to you and such disclosure and sharing does not require your consent
By signing this agreement, you agree to keep all information related to AIQU, its businesses, and finances confidential
Greater the power, greater the responsibility - here is what you should know!
Employment becomes operative only when you first report to the client office
Your day to day responsibilities will be assigned and supervised by the client directly
You are expected to follow all rules and regulations laid down by the client
It is recommended that you apply for travel insurance or continue your existing insurance till AIQU applies for your medical insurance
Any appearance or summons to appear at any criminal court, or for any criminal conviction or civil order, prior to or during the period of your employment has to be reported to AIQU
This contract shall be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of UAE
7 consecutive or 20 non-consecutive days of absenteeism without prior written permission could lead to termination without notice

Pursuit of alternate occupation is prohibited unless approved by AIQU in writing. On termination/resignation of your employment with TASC, you are prohibited from working with any competitor of TASC’s client in UAE including Free-zone areas in a role similar to or the same as what you are performing in client and you cannot contact or deal with any client of TASC for one year.

AIQU can help grow your business.
Congratulations! We are pleased to inform you that subsequent to your interview with us you have been selected for the position of {PositionDescription}.

You will be working for TASC Labour Services LLC (“TASC”) and you will be deputed with our client {ClientName}. You will initially be based in {WorkLocationDescription} however TASC reserves the right to transfer you to any of our client location within UAE as per the client requirement on similar terms and conditions.

column2: payroll services. Your day to day responsibilities will be assigned and supervised by the client directly. You will be required to follow all rules and regulations of the client.

column1: Your employment will be based on the following terms and conditions in addition to those stated in your labour contract

During your employment will be paid a salary of AED {GrossSalaryMonth} per hour. The salary will be calculated on the basis of work performed and stated in the approved time sheet received by TASC from the client.
In addition to the above, any incentives or bonus may be paid as per client’s discretion or if agreed to separately in the annexure.
The details of your remuneration and benefits are to be kept confidential.
Medical Insurance for {medical_category} only under company’s Group Insurance Policy.
22.00 working days or 30.00 calendar days paid leave as per UAE Labour Law.
Economy air ticket to home country once every {AirTicketYears}

column1: You will be entitled to sick leaves as per UAE Labour law.
You will be on probation for a period of {Period} months from the date of joining. Any leaves taken during the Probation Period shall be unpaid leaves.
<td>During the probation period, TASC may terminate your services with or without cause by giving one days’ notice. After probation period
column2: TASC may terminate your services by giving notice as per UAE Labour law.

column1: You may terminate your services with TASC by giving {Notice_Period} days notice applicable during and after probation period. In case you terminate your employment without giving notice, TASC may in certain cases at its own discretion accept equivalent salary in lieu of notice period.

In case if TASC is required to incur certain expenses to facilitate your training and you are also desirous of undergoing such training to enhance your career growth, if you resign or terminate your employment with TASC in less than one year, TASC will recover training and on boarding expenses from your full and final settlement. This will be limited to one months’ salary.

In case of any allegation of misconduct, fraud, gross negligence or any criminal act, or act of disobedience, insobriety, insubordination, or in case it is found that any information/academic qualification provided by you is false or misleading, your employment will be terminated with immediate effect, by TASC, in writing without notice or end of service benefits.
<td>If you absent yourself for 7 consecutive or 20 non-consecutive days without prior written permission
column2: your employment shall be terminated without any notice.

column1: You must return all materials and properties including but not limited to documents, notes, memoranda, records, list of customers, suppliers and employees, correspondences, documents, computer and other CDs, data, discs codes, designs and drawings and other documents whatsoever (whether made or created by you) belonging to or relating to the client and TASC on your resignation or termination or pay damages in lieu thereof.

Any leaves including any paid leaves which are accumulated and not utilized can be encashed as per policy.  In case of sick leave availed for more than 1 day, you will need to provide a medical certificate by the relevant government authority.
Your employment as aforesaid will become operative only when you first report to the client office.

This offer is subject to successful processing of your visa and legal entry permits by the UAE Ministry of Labour and immigration authorities. This offer is also subject to obtaining a Medical Fitness Certificate, Background Screening, police clearance certificate issued from your country of residence or nationality. In case any of these requirements are not met or the entry permit or visa is rejected for any reason what so ever, this offer letter will be construed as null and void. This offer letter is also subject to receipt of at least two satisfactory reference checks, the verification of the Educational Certificate and credentials submitted to TASC and may be revoked if the aforesaid is not received and all expenses incurred by TASC will be payable by you.

The ‘Offer of Employment’ and this ‘Offer letter’ are subject to TASC being in receipt of an offer for services from the client. Should the contract be withdrawn at any point by the client and it is deemed as being beyond the control of TASC, then TASC reserves the right to withdraw the offer to the candidate at any time prior to the due on boarding date with no reason being offered. No financial recompense will be paid by TASC to you.

In the event of your appearance at, or summons to appear at any criminal court, or in the event of any criminal conviction or civil order being made against you, either during the period of your employment with TASC or prior to joining TASC you must inform TASC as soon as possible and must on request give full details to TASC.

You accept and acknowledge that your personal information including but not limited to your passport, visa etc. (“Personal Information”) shall be stored by TASC on cloud based business application and you hereby agree that TASC shall not be liable in the event that such Personal Information is accessed, retrieved, distributed or used with or without authorization by TASC. You hereby fully indemnify and hold TASC harmless from any liability arising from any and all claims, requests, debts, expenses, losses and actions in relation to any authorized or unauthorized access, retrieval, distribution or usage of your Personal Information.

By accepting this offer of employment, you irrevocably agree to keep information related to TASC and its client confidential and private and not to communicate the same to any person including without limitation, information regarding the business and finances of the client and of TASC. A separate non-disclosure agreement shall be signed by you in this regard. This confidentiality clause will be binding on you even after your employment ends with TASC for any reason whatsoever.

In the event of your resignation, you will not undertake to seek employment in the field of a competitor in the United Arab Emirates for two years, according to Article 127 of the law from the date of resignation without prior approval of TASC.
You are prohibited from working for any other employers, paid or unpaid without a written consent of TASC during your employment with TASC.
By signing a copy of this offer letter

You will be on probation for a period of {Period} months from the date of joining. Any leaves taken during the Probation Period shall be unpaid leaves.

a. During the probation period, TOP TALENT may terminate your services with or without cause by giving one days’ notice. After probation period, TOP TALENT may terminate your services by giving notice as per UAE Labour law.

b. You may terminate your services with TOP TALENT by giving one calendar month notice applicable during and after probation period. In case you terminate your employment without giving notice, TOP TALENT may in certain cases at its own discretion accept equivalent salary in lieu of notice period.

c. In Case if TOP TALENT is required to incur certain expenses to facilitate your training and you are also desirous of undergoing such training to enhance your career growth, if you resign or terminate your employment with TOP TALENT in less than one year, TOP TALENT will recover training and on boarding expenses from your full and final settlement. This will be limited to one months’ salary.

d. In case of any allegation of misconduct, fraud, gross negligence or any criminal act, or act of disobedience, insobriety, insubordination, or in case it is found that any information/academic qualification provided by you is false or misleading, your employment will be terminated with immediate effect, by TOP TALENT, in writing without notice or end of service benefits.

d. e. By accepting this offer of employment, you irrevocably agree to keep information related to TOP TALENT and its client confidential and private and not to communicate the same to any person including without limitation, information regarding the business and finances of the client and of TOP TALENT. A separate non-disclosure agreement shall be signed by you in this regard. This confidentiality clause will be binding on you even after your employment ends with TOP TALENT for any reason whatsoever.

In the event of your resignation, you will not undertake to seek employment in the field of a competitor in the United Arab Emirates for two years, according to Article 127 of the law from the date of resignation without prior approval of TOP TALENT.
You are prohibited from working for any other employers, paid or unpaid without a written consent of TOP TALENT during your employment with TOP TALENT.

TASC Labour Services L.L.C - P.O. Box: 117495, Tel.: +971 4 3588500, Fax: +971 4 3546709

TASC Labour Services L.L.C.(AIQU) would like to offer you the position of {OfferLetterDesignation}.
Tentative DOJ – {Date}.
In order to facilitate your employment with our {ClientName}., we are issuing this Letter of Intent (“LOI”) which will be followed by a detailed offer letter (“OL”).
Your monthly salary package will be AED Amount wage type {GrossSalaryMonth}.
You will be entitled for the below additional benefits based on client approval.
List the benefits as per olr in addendum.
